publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1971 Des McNulty: Victory in the Champions League Finalâ€”That the Parliament notes the victory of Manchester United in the 2008 Champions League final, on the 50th anniversary of the Munich disaster; notes the outstanding success of Sir Alex Ferguson in terms of trophies won at the highest level, and congratulates him and his team for their most recent achievement.
S3M-1971 Victory in the Champions League Final (lodged on 22 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1971 Victory in the Champions League Final (lodged on 22 May 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-1971 Victory in the Champions League Final (lodged on 22 May 2008) David Stewart*
S3M-1971 Victory in the Champions League Final (lodged on 22 May 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-1971 Victory in the Champions League Final (lodged on 22 May 2008) Tom McCabe*
